annotations.description: Trigger Warning the tutorial doesn’t start until 7:12 so here’s a time stamp for you guys as the banter is a bit excessive! In this episode the boys tackle b...
annotations.title: Southern Whiskey Rebellion A Very Aptly Named Cocktail!

textContent:
1.25oz (37.5ml) Scotch
.75oz (22.5ml) Cynar
.75oz (22.5ml) Peach Liqueur
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
Lemon Twist

Shake and double strain into rocks glass. 
Garnish with lemon twist 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kR4reQ04Ynk
title: Southern Whiskey Rebellion
